title: T206 Gems - Demmitt St. Louis '4' & PSA '4' Drum
author: scottglevy

posts.post_title: T206 Gems - Demmitt St. Louis '4' & PSA '4' Drum
posts.post_content:
It's time to raise money for stuff I'm dyin' to buy in a few auctions:

Up for sale is .....
T206 Warhop DRUM - PSA 4 
T206 Demmit St. Louis - PSA 4

Serious inquiries for scans only please:
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

Demmitt has been listed on ebay.
Drum Warhop will be in Goodwin's April Auction.

Thank you to all for the interest.

Regards,
Scott
